issue.title: [Python] Python 2 integer serialization
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-2611](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2611). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
In Python 2, serializing a Python int with pyarrow.serialize and then deserializing it returns a long instead of an integer. Note that this is not an issue in python 3 where the long type does not exist.
